title: nIlOtpalAmbikAyai
sahitya:
nIlOtpalAmbikAyai namastE jagadambikAyai


anupallavi

 mUlAdhAra kSEtra sthitAyai mucukunda varapradAyai mUla 
mantrAtmikAyai mUlA jnAna hara guruguha varadAyai


caraNam   kAma sanjIvinyai kamalAvANI sEvitAyai kalikalmaSa nAshinyai 
karuNAmrta rasa pravAhinyai kAmEshvara mOhita kaulinyai kAmatantra 
vitaraNa naLinyai kamalEsha pUjita trikONAyai kAmitArtthaprada nipuNAyai
